C

Card - Class in ru.nsu.martynov
The card class.
Card(int, int) - Constructor for class ru.nsu.martynov.Card
Init card with suit (Spades — 0, Clubs — 1, Diamonds — 2, Hearts — 3) and rank (From 0 to 12: Ace, Two, Three, Four, ..., Nine, Ten, Jack, Queen, King).
